Tendermint | Berlin | Berkeley | Toronto | Onsite Preferred |https://tendermint.com/careers

Tendermint is building state-of-the-art consensus and networking protocols to enable internet-scale distributed applications. We’re passionate, self-driven, industry leaders whose mission is to build a better, freer internet. We're also building the Cosmos Network, a decentralized network of independent parallel blockchains, each powered by classical BFT consensus algorithms like Tendermint Core. We believe the technology we're building will have a major impact on human beings around the world. We’re well funded and growing quickly. Interested in helping us build an "Internet of Blockchains?" Apply Now
